pages.text: $(thing)Extreme Crafting/$ is a crafting recipe type that uses the $(item)Extreme Package Crafter/$ to craft recipes craftable in an $(item)Extreme Crafting Table/$.$(p)Items crafted by the $(item)Extreme Package Crafter/$ will be ejected into adjacent inventories.$(p)The $(item)Extreme Package Crafter/$ requires power.

pages.title: AE2 Integration
pages.text: The $(item)Extreme Package Crafter/$ can be connected to an $(thing)ME Network/$.$(p)It will extract power to use, and instead eject crafted items into the network.
